summary: Adds two berserker \"races\" to the game. (Kind of) Normal version, and no-magic version. Smash peoples faces in! Updated; a bit more balanced and a new power. Optional file that gives normal Nord berserkers powers, in case you don\'t want to start a new char.
descriptionHtml:
I originally made this mod för mitt eget höga nöje, but I figured someone could have fun with with it too. 
_______________________________________________________________________________________
UPDATE!

Burst of Rage - Stronger attacks and increased damage and magic resistance for a (very) short while.

Massive Berserker Rage - Shorter but more effective version of the Orc Berserker rage. Shrug off even the strongest attacks. Penalties to damage and stamina regeneration for a while after using the power.

Optional File - Gives the normal/vanilla Nord Race berserker powers. It doesn\'t give it the passive abilities, though.
________________________________________________________________________________________

The mod adds two new Berserker races. The Berserker is about as tall as a high elf. You can also choose red-coloured dirt when creating your character. It kinda looks like blood-splatter.

*The \"normal\" version has higher health and stamina, but lower magicka compared to the other races. 

Health and stamina also regenerates slighly faster, while magicka regenerates slightly slower.

Passive Abilities:
Bonus to intimidation attempts (larger chance to succed). Not 100% sure it works though.
Major bonus to unarmed damage, minor bonus to melee damage.
50 resistance to frost and disease
25 resistance to poison
20 resistance to magic

Powers (once a day):
Berserker rage - like the Orc berserker rage.
Massive Berserker Rage - Shorter but more effective version of the Orc Berserker rage. Shrug off even the strongest attacks. Penalties to damage and stamina regeneration for a while after using the power.
Pure Blind rage - You deal a lot more damage, but also take more damage. Guards will consider this a hostile action. 
Brutal Battle Cry - Like the nord battle cry

Lesser Powers (unlimited uses):
Mean look - Scare off weaker enemies.
Burst of Rage - Stronger attacks and increased damage and magic resistance for a (very) short while.

*The no-magic Berserker (Berserker Jotun) is born with a unique power that negates all forms of incoming magicka, but also makes the Berserk unable to cast any spells himself. So no magic.

Other than that the no-magic race is slightly stronger than the normal Berserker. He/she also has the same powers/abilities as the normal one. 

INSTALLATION
File goes into your Skyrim/Data folder.

English isn\'t my native language, sorry about any misspellings and/or strange grammar.

Mods that I think will go well with this one:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10906 - Dance of death. More Killmoves.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8170 - Killable Essential Characters (or some other mod like this one)
author: Surjamte
